TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Ke-ha-u_abinacadan, title = Ke-ha-u_abinacadan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ke-ha-u_abinacadan} }

S.FORM: == kakiliman == Kahau a binacadan u kamu nuheni tu atu lalangawan atu pacay a binacadan masasengitu, kiyu pakayni i inenciyacu ku tulas kiyu palecad han tu malecaday a binacadan Maydih mikaykic tu ni kalealaw tu ngangan nu binacadan, ci lay-kuwan-e a midinduay maydih pani i Abuan angangan amupulung tinatusaay a binacadan. Abuan 這個名稱來整合二族. nilacilan Maydih mikaykic tu nu kahau a binacadan kiyu yamabelecay tu ci pancinnay a laylay a tademaw nadikudan ci pan-yung-li atu duma kehau a nababalakian. cinida matineng mudadiw tu kehau nu mukasi a datuk midatengay tu nababalaki sananay a dadiw, (aiyan; 哀煙)kamu nu pacay, dumasa nu ayelan a tidaay yamabelecay tu ci pan-cin-i a tatayna, nau matinengay musakamu tu nu pacay a kamu. "(aiyan; 哀煙). . Daduducan a lalangawan dikuc 服飾 Kehau a binacadan u kakawsan nu heni adikuc idaw ku sumanahay langdaway, salengacay a kulit, yadah ku masangkakuay, patelekkay masadumaay a kaku nu kulit, ukulit atu nukulitan yadah ku masumaday, i likisi nu taywan tu sasingaan tu cacanan u pacay a binacadan nu mukasi a cacanan, u kapahay nu sining a hata idaw ku kulit nu hata, widasa nu kakawsan nu kehau a binacadan a kulit kuyda. kakanen 飲食 u alakuy, epah, mantaay a titi ni sasilawan, damay atu lami. . datuk 音樂 ya hungcaw a pacakayay tu likudu uidaway nu kehau a datuk "pacay a bunacadan,kehau a binacadan Ayan a datuk, wini u minanamay ci u-zung-sun mikilim I niyadu kyu makaala. ulisin 節慶 kehau a tademaw nikahedekan namilangec milisin atu malalikid, hidasatu alaw han mala piusiwkacuan nu kehau, kiyu u singacu nu huwan sa. mu-raraw a razem)atu u pan a singanganay a miusiwgacu, i nu pikalukan a kuyumisabaw cacayay a bulad sabaw lima a demiad, asikawaw, misahemay tu nu kakawsan a hemay tu lami' misakukuy, (tupalis yamadu/(mubuiak tupalis yamadu)usapisa kukuy, mikawaw tu mutengteng tu umah, (mahalit ubinacadan i umaumahan musaliyut tu ngidu mudadiw Ayan nuheni a didiw, mudakepay tu tabakiay a buting (tia kumuxay alaw)paculil tu hacuk maazazuah)acacana akawaw,amikining tu nababalaki milunguc tu pakadaesu, mupulung tu kapah nu binacadan. "(mu-raraw a razem)或" "阿拉粿"(tupalis yamadu/(mubuiak tupalis yamadu)為" "(mahalit,族人在田間圍火唱Ayan母語曲調歌謠),"抓大魚"(tia kumuxay alaw),"走標"(maazazuah) . pikulit tu bihid 紋面 Anli, sawla, uniwlan, alise, puyalihan muliwliw tu laway nu tatayna amikulit, masadip ku nipikulit, pulung han bangecal , nika mikulit aca tu udiudipan sa, masadumaay kuyda.

== kakiliman == Kahao a binacadan o kamo noheni to ato lalangawan ato pacay a binacadan masasengito, kiyo pakayni i inenciyaco ko tolas kiyo palecad han to malecaday a binacadan Maydih mikaykic to ni kalealaw to ngangan no binacadan, ci lay-kowan-e a midindoay maydih pani i Aboan angangan amopolong tinatosaay a binacadan. Aboan 這個名稱來整合二族. nilacilan Maydih mikaykic to no kahao a binacadan kiyo yamabelecay to ci pancinnay a laylay a tademaw nadikodan ci pan-yong-li ato doma kehao a nababalakian. cinida matineng modadiw to kehao no mokasi a datok midatengay to nababalaki sananay a dadiw, (aiyan; 哀煙)kamo no pacay, domasa no ayelan a tidaay yamabelecay to ci pan-cin-i a tatayna, nao matinengay mosakamo to no pacay a kamo. "(aiyan; 哀煙). . Dadodocan a lalangawan dikoc 服飾 Kehao a binacadan o kakawsan no heni adikoc idaw ko somanahay langdaway, salengacay a kolit, yadah ko masangkakoay, patelekkay masadomaay a kako no kolit, okolit ato nokolitan yadah ko masomaday, i likisi no taywan to sasingaan to cacanan o pacay a binacadan no mokasi a cacanan, o kapahay no sining a hata idaw ko kolit no hata, widasa no kakawsan no kehao a binacadan a kolit koyda. kakanen 飲食 o alakoy, epah, mantaay a titi ni sasilawan, damay ato lami. . datok 音樂 ya hongcaw a pacakayay to likodo oidaway no kehao a datok "pacay a bonacadan,kehao a binacadan Ayan a datok, wini o minanamay ci o-zong-son mikilim I niyado kyo makaala. olisin 節慶 kehao a tademaw nikahedekan namilangec milisin ato malalikid, hidasato alaw han mala piosiwkacoan no kehao, kiyo o singaco no howan sa. mo-raraw a razem)ato o pan a singanganay a miosiwgaco, i no pikalokan a koyomisabaw cacayay a bolad sabaw lima a demiad, asikawaw, misahemay to no kakawsan a hemay to lami' misakokoy, (topalis yamado/(moboiak topalis yamado)osapisa kokoy, mikawaw to motengteng to omah, (mahalit obinacadan i omaomahan mosaliyot to ngido modadiw Ayan noheni a didiw, modakepay to tabakiay a boting (tia komoxay alaw)pacolil to hacok maazazoah)acacana akawaw,amikining to nababalaki milongoc to pakadaeso, mopolong to kapah no binacadan. "(mo-raraw a razem)或" "阿拉粿"(topalis yamado/(moboiak topalis yamado)為" "(mahalit,族人在田間圍火唱Ayan母語曲調歌謠),"抓大魚"(tia komoxay alaw),"走標"(maazazoah) . pikolit to bihid 紋面 Anli, sawla, oniwlan, alise, poyalihan moliwliw to laway no tatayna amikolit, masadip ko nipikolit, polong han bangecal , nika mikolit aca to odiodipan sa, masadomaay koyda.
